revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - See Sosin's commments, with which I concur.

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Lin2 no superscript, simply <:χαίρειν|subst|χ̄αίρειν:> => χαίρειν. The regularization at 4 is fine, but I am not inclined to regard it as an emendation proper. I would prefer to enter <:ἱματιοφορίδα|reg|ἱματοφορίδα:> alone and let the revision history show that P. Salida observed the regularization. Next voter, what do you think? lin11=> νομι11.- ζωμεν; lin16=> <:φιλαλληλίαν|reg|φιλαλλη̣ίαν:>; lin21 no reg, since text already has ποιεῖν; ποεῖν appears to be a data entry error. Lin26 we don't regularize γείνεται;

l. 2: χαίρειν with superscript horizontal stroke l. 4: ἱματοφορίδα -> ἱματιοφορίδα regulation proposed by Peter Saliba; cf. LSJ and parallels in papyri (e.g. SB XX 15180, 6; XX 14625, 16; P.Princ. II 82, 43). l. 5 σύνριγγας -> σύριγγας (regulation) l. 21 ποεῖν -> ποιεῖν (regulation) l. 26 γείνεται -> γίνεται (regulation)
